title: 下载量771,044+ 神庙逃亡-notch
author: 紅月阿
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Angel_girl 于 2014-6-16 11:08 编辑 

这是一副模拟神庙逃亡建造的mc地图 
相似度很高~

注意：
在你跑酷过程中 
请调成和平模式
禁止破坏红石线路
当你跑到几乎接近终点时
需要发挥你的聪明才智才可以过关
内含不少机关
跑酷er 最渴望的地图

地图特点 
Features:
Animated face of Notch
Random Judgments
Notch tears
Lava deaths
Many Gold and Diamonds
Notch will judge you in the temple and either bless you with vast wealth :D or cast you into the bowels of the earth D:  You must place an offering into the “Well of Destiny” unlocking the temple doors to seek an audience with Notch.
Note: if you want a second judgment from notch please retrieve your offering from the well 1st.
Click the downloadnow! button to try it out for yourself.
If you play The Temple Of Notch on Youtube, please add a link to the official video in the description.

看不懂？ 翻译去吧！

游戏内截图



下面我很穷。。。你们知道怎么做的


提示 地图很多机关哦！笨蛋是玩不过的

动画的缺口

　　切口的眼泪
　　熔岩死亡
